expressions-desc: Enhances the parser with boolean algebra.
expressions-unidentified-token-message: I got stuck at the following character:
expressions-unidentified-token-submessag: I did not recognize the highlighted character.
expressions-unidentified-token-hint: Try removing the character to see if that helps
expressions-invalid-type-message: I got stuck at the following location:
expressions-invalid-type-submessage: I was expecting to see a $1 at the highlighted location, because $3, but instead I got a $2.
expressions-invalid-type-hint: Try using a different operator or make sure the operand has the correct type.
expressions-binary-left-type-exception: the operator `$1` only accepts a $2 as its left operand
expressions-binary-right-type-exception: the operator `$1` only accepts a $2 as its right operand
expressions-unary-type-exception: the operator `$1` only accepts a $2 as its operand
expressions-unclosed-paren-message: I was expecting a closing parenthesis, because the highlighted parenthesis was not closed, but instead I reached the end of the expression:
expressions-unclosed-paren-hint: Try adding a ')' at the end of the expression to see if that helps.
expressions-unexpected-token-message: I got stuck at the following token:
expressions-unexpected-token-submessage: I was expecting to see $2, but instead I got '$1'.
expressions-unexpected-token-value-hint: Try adding a value $1 the highlighted token to see if that helps.
expressions-unexpected-token-operator-hi: Try adding an operator $1 the highlighted token to see if that helps.
expressions-unexpected-token-rightparen-: Try removing the highlighted parenthesis to see if that helps.
